title: Previewing Super Bowl 56
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss who will win the Super Bowl with Hall of Famer Steve Young, react to some major NBA trades and a memorable night in the Olympics.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Hall Of Famer Steve Young Helps Preview Super Bowl 56
